#include <iostream>

unsigned int Reverse (unsigned int num)
{
	int reverse =0;
	while(num > 0)
	{
		reverse = reverse*10 + (num%10);
		num = num/10;
	}
	return reverse;
}

int main()
{
	int n,x,y;
	std::cin>>n;
	while(n >0)
	{
		--n;
		std::cin>>x>>y;
		std::cout<< Reverse ( Reverse(x) + Reverse(y) )<< std::endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
